Info.Description: Transforms the image into a mosaic-like pattern, replacing groups of pixels with a single average color. It's a useful tool for creating stylized, abstract renditions of the images or for obscuring details for privacy purposes.

Properties.Name: CellSize
Properties.Summary: Adjusts the size of the individual cells in the mosaic. A larger cell size results in a more abstract and pixelated image, while a smaller cell size retains more detail, creating a more recognizable, yet still stylized image.
